detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: The attorney works for the client, not the other way around. It is always the client’s case, which is why our job is to investigate, evaluate, and advise our clients.

detailsData.title: Complete Trust and Honesty
detailsData.content: The attorney-client relationship must be based on complete trust and honesty. That’s why I will never sugar-coat anything, but I will always be respectful and empathetic.

detailsData.title: Face-to-Face Meetings
detailsData.content: We want a face-to-face meeting with our clients before we begin working on their behalf. This meeting is a two-way interview to ensure mutual compatibility.

detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: With over 27 years of expertise, we are committed to fighting in court for those we represent. We aim to get each client every cent deserved.

address: 2208 W Chesterfield Blvd. Suite 108 Springfield, MO 65807
subHeading: I want to be your attorney.
valueProp: At The Morrissey Law Firm, P.C., we value our relationships with our clients. The attorney works for the client, not the other way around. It is always the client’s case, which is why our job is to investigate, evaluate, and advise our clients. Our client's job is to make decisions that will determine the outcome of their personal injury case, with my guidance every step of the way.
openHours: Mon-Thurs: 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m., Fri: 8:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m., Closed on the weekend

testimonalData.text: Thomas Morrissey provided exceptional legal representation and was always there to answer my questions.

testimonalData.text: The Morrissey Law Firm helped me get the compensation I deserved after my car accident.
